answers.answer:
Individuals arriving in Iași can access a wide range of assistance, including support for accommodation, meals, and integration, along with medical services, psychological support, and educational opportunities like Romanian language courses. There is also help available for transportation information, legal advice, and various specialized services provided by numerous organizations.

To find detailed information, go to the website `https://dopomoha.ro/en/dopomoha-iasi` and read under the sections such as "Important contacts", "The support program for accommodation, meals and integration in Iași", "Transportation", "Medical services", "Psychological support", "Education", and "Organisations offering their support".
